'''Dance with the Great Vortex''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[The Shimmering Voyage]]''.

It was featured in the [[Archon Quest]]s ''[[Turning Point]]'' and ''[[Where the Heart Finds Rest]]'', during the combat challenges against [[Osial]] and [[Beisht]] respectively. It also served as Domain music in the event ''[[Hypostatic Symphony]]''.
